name: FOCUS
description: FOCUS is an open-source community that aims to oversee and maintain free software dedicated to the management and preservation of the fishery resource.

SDGs.evidenceText: All FOCUS deliverables are jointly produced and published as free and open-source. As such FOCUS truly offers its members an interoperable fisheries management platform in the most cost efficient and open way. Furthermore, FOCUS supports the 14:th of the UN Sustainable Development Goals
